description: This table is a continuation of the PRE_AR_CHG table. This table contains one row for each line of each temporary accounts receivable (TAR) record (think of a TAR record as one charge entry screen and each line as an individual procedure). Deleting charge lines will delete rows from this table. This table contains additional information about the procedure.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: CHARGE_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this transaction record.  This represents a single charge procedure in the transaction.

columns.name: PENDING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pending status of this transaction: 1 means Pending and 2 means Waiting to Pend. If blank, the transaction is not pending.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Waiting to Pend

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
What this transaction record is used for (e.g. charge, payment, adjustment, etc...).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge


Payment/Adjustment


Single Adjustment


Visit


Express Payment

columns.name: PENDING_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pending reason category ID for the temporary�transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Error in Charge Entry Validation Check


Warning in Charge Entry Validation Check


Import: Transaction Imported to holding Tank


Inpatient: Charge needs to be reviewed

columns.name: PENDING_COMMENT
columns.description: A free-text comment to further explain why this transaction is pending.

columns.name: LAST_EDITED_DATE
columns.description: The last date the check payment was edited.

columns.name: HOSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the hospital account record ID for the transaction.

columns.name: EXT_BILLING_NUM
columns.description: A billing number from an external billing system.

columns.name: EXT_REFERENCE_NUM
columns.description: A reference number from an external billing system.

columns.name: ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The kind of encounter which is associated with this transaction (e.g. Walk-In, Appointment, Anesthesia, etc...).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Registration


Walk-In


Hospital Encounter


Canceled


Unmerge


Contact Moved


Intake


EMPTY


Research Encounter


Recurring Plan


Update


PCP/Clinic Change


Wait List

Questionnaire Series Submission


Travel

E-Consult


E-Consult Community Order

Telemedicine

External Communication


Reconciled Outside Data


External Contact

Home Health Admission

Patient Web Update

Letter (Out)

columns.name: PROV_SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The provider's area of expert knowledge which applies for this transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DEFAULT_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The service date when this transaction took place.

columns.name: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN
columns.description:
Do Not Bill Insurance for the charge session (taken from visit if encounter form # is used). Possible values will be "Y" and "N".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CHARGE_DESC_OVRIDE
columns.description: Holds the charge description if it has been changed from the default.

columns.name: PROC_MED_NEC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this particular charge line is a medical necessity or not.  Possible values will be "Y" and "N".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: COPAY_INDICATOR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The payment type for this copay.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Co-ins


Copay


Not Covered


No Patient Payment

columns.name: TAX
columns.description: The tax related to this charge.

columns.name: TAX_PROC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure line is a tax procedure

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnoses which apply to this charge line. This will be in the form of comma-separated integers, where each integer corresponds with a line in the CHG_REVIEW_DX table for this transaction.

columns.name: MANUAL_PRICE_OVRIDE
columns.description: Indicates if this price override is a manual override or was due to a pricing contract.

columns.name: ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Adjustment amount for one charge line.

columns.name: PRICE_OVRIDE_FLAG
columns.description: Holds the price override for this line, if one has been set.

columns.name: PANEL_PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure number for this charge line. Corresponds to the Procedure Master # (EAP-100).

columns.name: HEMATOCRIT_READING
columns.description: The hematocrit reading for this procedure, if one has been taken.

columns.name: HEMOGLOBIN_READING
columns.description: The hemoglobin reading for this procedure, if one has been taken.

columns.name: CHG_NOT_BILL_INS_YN
columns.description:
Do Not Bill Insurance for charge line. Possible values will be "Y" and "N".


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN

columns.name: CHARGE_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of time in minutes that this procedure took.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The time when this procedure was started.

columns.name: STOP_TIME
columns.description: The time when this procedure was finished.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date when this procedure was started.

columns.name: STOP_DATE
columns.description: The date when this procedure was finished.

columns.name: SERVICE_TIME
columns.description: The time of service for a charge line.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The self-pay amount associated with this charge line as determined by the Benefits Engine.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim information record associated with this charge line.

columns.name: CHG_CVG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coverage status category ID for the temporary transaction. This is�determined by the Benefits Engine.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Covered, write-off


Not covered


Covered, no write-off


Not covered but assigned to payer

columns.name: OLD_ETR_ID
columns.description: The unique Accounts Receivable (AR) transaction ID which is associated with this charge record. This column is frequently used to link to the ARPB_TRANSACTIONS table.

columns.name: ANESTHESIA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Anesthesia procedure type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General


IV


Local


Monitored Anesthesia Care


Regional

columns.name: EMERG_STATUS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates where this charge is associated with an admitted�patient with an emergency status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PHYSICAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Physical status of the patient who had the anesthesia procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal Healthy


Mild Systemic Disease


Severe Systemic Disease


Severe/Threat


Moribund


Brain Dead

columns.name: ANES_BASE_UNITS
columns.description: Anesthesia base units for the charge procedure.

columns.name: EMERG_UNITS
columns.description: Emergency units for the charge procedure.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_STAT_UNITS
columns.description: Physical status units for the charge procedure.

columns.name: AGE_UNITS
columns.description: Age units for the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: ANES_AGE_PROC_ID
columns.description: Anesthesia age unit procedure.

columns.name: ANES_EMERG_PROC_ID
columns.description: Anesthesia emergency unit procedure.

columns.name: CHARGE_BILL_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anesthesia billing status category ID for the temporary transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Supplemental


Supplemental Unit

columns.name: ANES_SUPP_UNITS
columns.description: Anesthesia supplemental units.

columns.name: ANES_AGE_PROC_UNIT
columns.description: Anesthesia age unit procedure unit.

columns.name: ANES_EMERG_PROC_UNT
columns.description: Anesthesia emergency unit procedure unit.

columns.name: ORIG_ANES_TX_SS
columns.description: Original anesthesia transaction for special supplemental.

columns.name: RAD_THER_END
columns.description: Indicates end of radiation treatment.

columns.name: RAD_THER_LINK
columns.description: Radiation therapy link for transfer/retro.

columns.name: CHANGED_DX_PX_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if charge review changed the diagnosis or procedure.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN

columns.name: ORIG_PAT_AMT
columns.description: Original self-pay amount before discount.

columns.name: SST_DISCNT_OVRD_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate that the self-pay discount amount was manually overridden by the user.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN

columns.name: SST_SP_AMT_OVRD_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate that the self-pay amount was overridden in the self-pay discount workflow.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN

columns.name: SST_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The self-pay discount amount.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_OVRRID_C_NAME
columns.description:
Place of service type override for a single charge line


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:

Office


Home

Group Home


Mobile Unit

columns.name: BFD_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the coverage used to compute reimbursement and pricing contract for charge lines that qualify for bill for denial workflows.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The medication ID of the medication associated with this charge.

columns.name: WRITE_OFF_EXCEPTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The write-off exception for this charge. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


Yes, No NCC either

columns.name: INSURANCE_ONLY_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description:
A flag to indicate if insurance only billing applies to this charge.  


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


yes and new SST

columns.name: AUTO_PAT_WRITEOFF_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is set when the user flags the charge line for an automatic patient writeoff, and it is unset if the user unflags the charge line. This allows the system to distinguish when the user was the source of the insurance only flag value, rather than the system having set it automatically.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: INSURANCE_ONLY_FLAG_C_NAME

columns.name: DENTAL_PREAUTH_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount that will be sent to insurance for preauthorization for the associated charge line.
